content.rendered:
This package involves auditing your website and making changes to improve your site loading speed. Research shows that users quickly get frustrated and abandon sites that take more than a few seconds to load, and this is especially true for mobile users. Cutting your site loading time can lead to a massive boost in user engagement and conversion rates.

The package includes:

  • Testing your homepage and landing pages
  • Measuring site loading speeds
  • Optimizing, reducing and compressing images
  • Removing scripts that increase loading time
  • Implementing browser caching through solutions such as Cloudflare
